TopicTitle: Part in the centre of my rocket overheating (eve descent)

Articles.Content:
I am trying to land on eve, but a single engine in the middle of my rocket keeps overheating and exploding. See picture taken just before it blew up. 

Is this a bug? I can't understand why this is happening, I even put a heat shield directly under the engine (in addition to the inflatable one) and nothing changes. 

Apologies if this is in the wrong section

Thanks, Tom
Welcome to the forums, @Swurdo.  This is a known bug that's been around for several months.  The bug tracker page is here.
Thanks so much Entropian, guess I'll have to try a different engine :)!
